isis.stitle: DT-466E and 530E Diesel Engine Diagnostics Model Years 1999-2000 - DIAGNOSTIC TOOLS - MASTER DIAGNOSTICS (MD 32) - GRAPHIC WINDOW and ADDING PARAMETER IDENTIFIERS (PID)

svcproc.title: GRAPHIC WINDOW and ADDING PARAMETER IDENTIFIERS (PID)

svcsubproc.title: Data in Graphical Format
svcsubproc.para: To monitor the engine parameter data in graphical format create a graphical window. This is similar to creating a text view window. Select File then New on the menu bar. Open the Select a File Type dialog box.
Select Parameter Graphical View (.pgv) and click OK.
A generic graphical display window will appear without parameters. The graphical display window shows the time axis and the range axis .
Adding or deleting a single or series of parameters is the same as the procedure the previous section Data in Text Format beginning with Step 4 .
The graphical window shows the selected parameters and their acronyms. Master Diagnostics preselects different colors for each parameter in the order they are added to the window .
Use a text view window to find the full description for these parameters .
